If you mash a piece of metal that 's cold , you create microscopic weak points in it , as you are basically ripping apart tiny crystals ( extra - strong solid regions ) that form within the metal . If you mash a piece of metal that 's hot , new crystals tend to form as it cools off in the new shape , so you do n't get those tiny stress fractures in the final product . Depending on how you heated and cooled it , the metal can end up harder or softer than it started .

# # What is a File System ? Imagine your computer as a recipe book . It contains sections , such as " * Cakes * " , " * Soups * " or * " Stews * " which represent directories , and within each section are individual recipes , which represent the files on your computer . So you have a list of sections ( directories ) each of which contains a list of recipes ( files ) . The contents page contains a table which tells you on which page you can find each section and each individual recipe . This is like your file system , which is essentially a big table which tells the operating system on which part of the disk it

can find each directory and file . With a recipe book , you can easily flick through the book to find things without looking through the contents , but on a computer that 's quite a bit harder because there are so many files : often hundreds of thousands or even millions on a single system . So on a computer , the file system is , for all intents and purposes , the only way to find files and directories . The act of * formatting * a disk with a specific file system is what actually creates a file system , which is like an empty contents table . It gives you a place where you can insert your recipes ( files ) and sections (

directories ) . ---- # # Deleting files What happens when you delete a file or a directory on a computer is that the entry in the file system is simply removed . It 's like just crossing out the entry for an individual recipe in the contents page of the recipe book . Notice that the actual recipe is still in the book , and you can still find it if you scan through the book looking for it . This is how undelete programs are able to recover deleted files ; they can search for the file on the disk and re - insert the entry back into the file system just like re - adding an entry for a recipe back into the contents table

DomStud got close , but I think he still missed a piece or two . Anything digital breaks what it 's representing down into a series of numbers . Since there 's a limit to size , this means you have to break both pressure ( amplitude ) and time into steps . The smaller those steps are , the more we know about the sound and the more accurately we can represent it . Each number used to represent a piece of the sound is known as a * sample * . The 24 here means 24 bits , referring to the amount of data in each sample . Those 24 bits allow each sample to have 16,777,216 possible steps for how much pressure the sound is

putting on the air at that instant . By comparison , CDs use only 16 - bit samples , so they only have 65,536 possible steps for that pressure . The 96 refers to 96 kilohertz , meaning that 96,000 samples are recorded for each second of sound ( this value is called the * sampling frequency * ) . The more samples are used for each second , the higher the pitch ( frequency ) is that the sound file can accurately record . The human ear hears up to about 20 kHz ( as a child -- adults hear a smaller range ) , but the extra space is needed because sound is about the * changes * in pressure , not just the pressure itself

-- a file can reproduce up to half the sampling frequency , but it sounds better if it 's much less than that . Again for comparison , a CD samples at only 44.1 kHz . This is n't free , of course -- all that extra data takes up a lot of space . That CD ( 44,100 Hz x 2 bytes x 2 channels ) uses 176,400 bytes every second , or just a tiny bit over 10 megabytes every minute . Meanwhile , a 24/96 WAV file ( we ca n't use FLAC for this example because that uses * lossless compression * , which is a discussion for another day ) uses over three times as much space ( 96,000 Hz x 3 bytes

, so I personally think it 's a pretty tall claim to say you need 256 times that much sensitivity . Likewise , there are n't too many instruments ( and pretty much no human voices ) that get so high that we 're likely to need more samples to make them sound right . * * TL;DR :* * More data means smaller steps to show smaller changes . And I did it without saying Nyquist .

If the equity market in the USA crashed, its very likely equity markets everywhere else would crash. The USA has a high number of the world's largest businesses and there are correlations between equity markets. So you need to think of equities as a global asset class, not regional. Your question is then a question about the correlation between equity markets and currency markets.  Here's a guess: If equity markets crashed, you would see a lot of panic selling of stocks denominated in many currencies, but probably the most in USD, due to the large number of the world's largest businesses trading on US stock exchanges. Therefore, when the rest of the world sells US equities they receive cash USD, which they might sell for their local currency. That selling pressure would cause USD to fall. But, when equity markets crash there's a move to safety of the bond markets. The world's largest bond markets are denominated in which currency? Probably USD. So those who receive USD for their equities are going to spend that USD on bonds. In which case there is probably no correlation between equity markets and currency markets at all. Chest pain while taking a breath can be caused by a variety of conditions. Some possible causes include:Pulmonary embolism: This is a serious condition that occurs when a blood clot becomes stuck in the lungs. It can cause chest pain, difficulty breathing, and coughing.Pneumonia: This is an infection of the lungs that can cause chest pain, fever, cough, and difficulty breathing.Bronchitis: This is an inflammation of the bronchial tubes that can cause chest pain, coughing, and difficulty breathing.Asthma: This is a chronic respiratory condition that causes the airways to narrow and produce extra mucus, leading to chest pain, difficulty breathing, and coughing.Costochondritis: This is an inflammation of the cartilage that connects the ribs to the sternum, and can cause chest pain that worsens when taking a deep breath or coughing.It's important to note that chest pain can also be a symptom of a heart attack, which is a medical emergency. If you are experiencing chest pain, difficulty breathing, or other concerning symptoms, you should seek medical attention immediately.

Scissors and wire cutters are designed to cut different materials, so they are not equally good at cutting all things. Scissors are designed to cut thin, flexible materials like paper and cloth. They have two sharp blades that come together and slice through the material as you move the scissors back and forth.Wire cutters, on the other hand, are designed to cut hard, thick materials like wire. They have thicker, stronger blades and a handle with leverage, which helps you apply more force to the cutting edge. This makes it easier to cut through wire, but it also means that wire cutters are not as good at cutting thin, flexible materials like paper and cloth. They may require more force to cut these materials, and they may not make a clean, precise cut.So, to summarize, scissors are good at cutting thin, flexible materials because they have sharp blades and are designed to make precise cuts. Wire cutters are good at cutting hard, thick materials because they have strong blades and a handle with leverage, which helps you apply more force to the cutting edge.

There 's a force that keeps atoms bound together ( called the strong nuclear force ) . It 's powerful enough to overcome the electromagnetic forces that would otherwise push protons away from each other . When a nuclear warhead detonates , a number of the molecules are split , releasing the nuclear binding energy that was holding them together . Once one molecule does this , the flying particles hit others and cause them to do the same , resulting in a cascade of molecules splitting in a very short amount of time . All this energy results in a huge explosion . The fallout of a single nuke is n't incredibly dangerous if the bomb detonates in the air ( as the two used in WW2 were ) since the radioactive debris is blown away and dispersed by wind and water relatively quickly . However , should a nuke detonate at ground level , radioactive material will mix with dirt and settle , causing elevated levels of radiation in the area .

Dogs all over the world behave similarly because they are all descended from wolves, which are their wild ancestors. Through the process of domestication, humans have been breeding dogs for various purposes such as hunting, guarding, and companionship. This has resulted in a wide variety of breeds, each with its own unique physical characteristics and behaviors. However, all dogs share certain behaviors and instincts because they are all part of the same species, Canis lupus familiaris. For example, when a dog is yelled at to get off the bed, it may stand still because it is trying to understand what the person wants and is looking for cues about what to do next. This behavior is a result of the dog's instinct to follow the leadership of a dominant member of its pack, which in this case is the person yelling at the dog. Dogs are also very good at reading body language and facial expressions, so they may be trying to gauge the person's mood and intentions. Overall, dogs behave similarly because they have a strong instinct to communicate and cooperate with their human and animal companions, and they are highly adaptable to different environments and situations.

In a computer network, a "port" is a specific place where data can be sent or received by a computer or device. When data is sent over the internet or other networks, it is divided into small packets and each packet is sent to its destination through a specific port. Sometimes, a device or computer on a network might have certain services or applications that need to receive data from the internet. For example, a computer might have a web server running on it that needs to receive data from the internet so that other people can access the website hosted on that computer. In this case, the computer would need to have a specific port open to receive data from the internet. "Port forwarding" is a process

hosted on that computer from the internet. In this case, you would set up port forwarding on your router so that any data that comes in through port 80 is sent to the computer running the web server. In summary, port forwarding allows you to receive data from the internet on a specific port on your device or computer, which can be useful if you are running certain services or applications that need to receive data from the internet.

Erectile dysfunction (ED) can have many causes, and it is important to get a proper diagnosis and treatment. Water pressure is the force that the water puts on something. It increases as you go deeper underwater because there is more water above you. The pressure is the same at any given depth, no matter where you are, because the pressure is caused by the weight of the water above you.Imagine you are holding a book above your head. The book is exerting a downward force on your arm because of its weight. The more books you stack on top of the first one, the more force they will exert on your arm. It's the same with water. As you go deeper underwater, there is more water above you, and so the pressure increases.Your ears may hurt when you go underwater because the pressure inside your ears is different than the pressure outside. When you go underwater, the pressure outside your ears increases, and this can cause your ears to feel uncomfortable or even painful. To equalize the pressure and relieve the discomfort, you can try pinching your nose and blowing gently, or you can try swallowing or yawning. This will help to open the Eustachian tubes, which are small passageways in your ears that help to balance the pressure inside and outside your ears.

Beavers build dams to flood an area , which allows them to move from their lodge to their feeding areas by swimming through water instead of walking on land where they are more vulnerable to predators . Beavers predominately eat willow , cottonwood and aspen trees , specifically the tasty and nutritious cambium layer under the bark . These trees grow in the riparian zone ( along rivers , lakes and streams ) where beavers mostly hang out . A study was conducted that determined that the instinct to build dams is triggered by the sound of running water . Beavers were left in an empty room with a pile of sticks , and the sound of water was played from different directions , and the beavers would move the pile of sticks to where they heard the water . Beaver created ponds provide habitat for a lot of other animals , from birds to big game , and provide crucial ecosystem services that greatly benefit people too . Their ponds store water ( like reservoirs ) and make it available later in the year when it 's needed most . They also filter the water , and some of it seeps into the ground and recharges aquifers . The ponds Eventually fill with sediment and become beautiful meadows .

If we removed all the fish, shellfish, sea mammals, and other aquatic animals from the oceans, the water level would not drop at all. This is because the water in the oceans is held in place by the force of gravity and the shape of the Earth's surface, not by the presence of aquatic life. Think of it like this: if you have a bucket full of marbles and you take the marbles out, the water level in the bucket will not change. The same is true for the oceans and the aquatic life that lives in them. The water in the oceans is already being held in place by the Earth, so removing the fish and other aquatic animals would not make a difference to the water level.

All Occam 's Razor says is that if you have a problem or question , and a series of possible solutions or answers , then the option which is the most simple is usually the correct one . For example . I have a small toddler and a 13 year old boy . I leave cookies out on the counter ( good ones ) . I leave the room for a few hours and come back to find that the cookies are gone . What happened to them ? Well , the theories I have are : * The toddler moved a chair over to the counter , climbed up on it , got the cookies , ate all of them , and then put the chair back . * The 13 year old took the cookies Both of these theories are valid , but Occam 's Razor tells us that it is * more likely * that the 13 year old took the cookies , because it involves less variables and less complexity than the alternative .

Mandarin and Cantonese are both dialects of the Chinese language, but they are spoken in different parts of China and have some differences in pronunciation, vocabulary, and grammar. Mandarin is the official language of China and is spoken by the majority of people in the country, while Cantonese is mainly spoken in the southeastern region of Guangdong and in Hong Kong.When the government makes an announcement, they often write it in a universal script called Simplified Chinese, which is used in mainland China and Singapore. This script uses fewer strokes per character than the traditional script used in Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Macau, which is called Traditional Chinese. Both Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese use the same set of characters, but the characters may look slightly different depending on which script is used.Even though Mandarin and Cantonese are different dialects, they can both understand and read written Simplified Chinese, as the characters represent the same meanings in both dialects. However, when these characters are pronounced, they may sound different depending on the dialect being spoken. For example, the character for "tiger" is written the same way in both Simplified and Traditional Chinese, but it is pronounced "hǔ" in Mandarin and "fú" in Cantonese.

First is that it 's generally the female of the species that is choosy about her mate , because to reproduce she has to expend huge amounts of energy compared to the male ( because she has to create / lay eggs or go through pregnancy ) . Males expend almost no energy impregnating a female . Since evolution is driven by genes propagating to future generations , this means that the best " strategy "

for males is to be promiscuous and impregnate as many females as possible , since from the males point of view failed offspring are n't a problem since not much energy was invested . They just want to have as many offspring as possible , maximizing the number of successful ones . Females , on the other hand , have to be choosy about their mates because wasting all that time and energy to create a failed offspring would be fairly detrimental in the grand scheme of passing genes to future generations . When a person is sleepwalking, they are in a state of sleep, but their body is moving around and acting as if they are awake. If you wake a sleepwalker, they may not know where they are or what is happening, and this can be disorienting and unsettling for them. It is best to try to gently guide a sleepwalker back to bed, rather than waking them up. This can help them return to a state of sleep more easily and comfortably.

Feces and urine both contain waste products that the body no longer needs. These waste products are made up of things like undigested food, bacteria, and other substances. When these waste products are present in large amounts, they can give off a strong, unpleasant smell.One reason that feces and urine smell bad is because they contain bacteria. Bacteria are tiny living organisms that are found all around us, including in our bodies. Some bacteria produce chemicals called volatile organic compounds (VOCs) that can have a strong, unpleasant smell.Another reason that feces and urine smell bad is because they contain chemicals called amines. Amines are produced when proteins break down, and they can also have a strong, unpleasant smell.So, even though feces and urine are made up of left over processed food, it's the waste products, bacteria, and amines present in them that give them their characteristic bad smell.

Your electric toothbrush charges without electrical contacts because it uses a technology called inductive charging. This means that it uses magnetism to transfer electricity from the charger to the toothbrush. The charger contains a coil of wire that creates a magnetic field. When you place the toothbrush on the charger, another coil of wire in the toothbrush picks up the magnetic field and converts it back into electricity, which charges the battery in the toothbrush. The base of the charger may feel warm because the coil of wire inside generates heat as it creates the magnetic field. Does that help to understand how it works?

Seizures are sudden changes in the brain's electrical activity that can cause a variety of symptoms. They are usually caused by abnormal activity in the brain's nerve cells, which can be triggered by things like a lack of sleep, certain medications, or a brain injury. When someone has a seizure, it can feel like their body is shaking or trembling, or they may lose consciousness and fall to the ground. They may also have strange sensations, like a tingling feeling or seeing bright lights, and they may have trouble speaking or moving. Some people who have seizures regularly (also known as epilepsy) may be able to tell when they are about to have a seizure because they have certain warning signs, like feeling dizzy or seeing flashing lights. However, not everyone with epilepsy has warning signs, and sometimes seizures can happen without any warning at all. It's important to remember that seizures are not the person's fault, and they can usually be treated with medication or other therapies. If you or someone you know has seizures, it's important to see a doctor and follow their treatment plan to help control the seizures and keep the person safe.

A hung jury is a term used to describe a situation in which the members of a jury are unable to reach a unanimous verdict in a criminal trial. This can happen if the jurors are unable to agree on the guilt or innocence of the defendant, or if they are unable to agree on a sentence in a capital case. When a jury is unable to reach a verdict, the case may be declared a mistrial and a new trial may be scheduled with a different jury. Alternatively, the prosecution may decide not to pursue the case further and dismiss the charges.

There are a few ways you can use options to help insulate against volatility while collecting dividends from your stocks:Buy a call option: This gives you the right to buy a stock at a certain price (the strike price) before a certain date (the expiration date). If you buy a call option on a stock that pays dividends, you'll receive the dividend as long as you hold the option when the dividend is paid. This can help you collect dividends without having to actually own the stock, which can be useful if you're trying to minimize your exposure to market volatility.Sell a put option: This gives you the obligation to buy a stock at a certain price (the strike price) before a certain date (the expiration date). If

stock is put to you and you end up owning it.Buy a protective put: This is a combination of buying a stock and buying a put option on that stock. If you buy a protective put, you'll receive the dividend as long as you hold the stock when the dividend is paid, and you'll also have the added protection of the put option if the stock price falls.It's important to note that options carry their own set of risks and are not suitable for all investors. It's always a good idea to carefully consider your investment objectives and risk tolerance before trading options.

Candlestick charts are a type of financial chart used to depict the price movement of securities, derivatives, or currency pairs over a given period of time. Each candlestick on the chart represents a specific time period, and the shape of the candlestick is used to represent the price action of the security during that time period.The main components of a candlestick chart are the open, high, low, and close prices for the time period being depicted. The open price is the price at which the security first traded during the time period. The high price is the highest price at which the security traded during the time period. The low price is the lowest price at which the security traded during the time period. The close price is the price at which the security last traded during the time period.Candlestick charts are used by traders to identify potential buying or selling opportunities based on the price action of a security. They can also be used to identify trends, patterns, and potential reversal points in the price of a security.There are many different patterns that can be identified on a candlestick chart, such as bullish or bearish trends, doji patterns, and gaps. By interpreting these patterns and the underlying price action, traders can make informed decisions about when to buy or sell a security.

It is broadly the case that the grid is designed so that the exact amount of electricity being used is being generated . This is orchestrated using sophisticated scheduling , adjustment mechanisms , and a ~1 % reserve of power plants ( and increasingly loads ) that can respond quickly . But at the shortest timescales , like hundredths of a second , there is always a bit of an an imbalance , either too much or too little . When there is excess generation , the extra energy pushes up against the inertia of all the spinning generators and turbines ( and motors and other physical loads ) . This spinning equipment immediately absorbs the energy and starts spinning faster , in which case the frequency starts

pull power off the grid by charging the battery or spinning up the flywheel ) . This takes a second or two to kick in , so the frequency is allowed to vary a tiny bit . There are also capacitors all over the place . These are used for reactive power correction , but they probably interact in this process as well . Someone smarter than me would have to comment on that .

Your brain is designed to help you cope with how complicated life is . Only part of your brain makes the decisions you 're aware of , and that decision - making part can only do so much at a time . Things you do often become habits so that your brain can do them without needing you to spend deliberate decision - making time on those . Habitual actions can be done much more quickly , and without the need to decide on how to carry out each step of the action . When a performer " chokes " - whether it 's singing or hitting a baseball - they are unable to use their habits and have to think of each step to do what it is they 're trying to do . Because the decision - making part of their brain is n't involved in the things that are habit , they often have a hard time remembering everything they need to do at once , and so they are unable to do things as easily or as good as during practice .

John Lennon, a musician and former member of the Beatles, was shot and killed by Mark David Chapman on December 8, 1980, in New York City. Chapman had become obsessed with the book "Catcher in the Rye" and identified with its protagonist, Holden Caulfield, before the shooting. He shot Lennon outside of Lennon's residence at the Dakota apartment building on the Upper West Side of Manhattan. Lennon was taken to Roosevelt Hospital, where he was pronounced dead on arrival. Chapman remained at the scene of the crime and was arrested shortly thereafter. He later pleaded guilty to the murder and is currently serving a sentence of 20 years to life in prison.

In many languages, including English, words for objects, animals, and other nouns are not inherently male or female. Instead, the gender of a noun is often assigned based on the gender of the person or being to which the noun refers. For example, the word "girl" refers to a female person, so in English, the word "girl" is considered a feminine noun. Similarly, the word "boy" refers to a male person, so it is considered a masculine noun in English. However, not all languages assign gender to nouns in this way. In some languages, the gender of a noun is based on the meaning of the word or its ending. For example, in Spanish, nouns that end in "-o" are usually masculine and nouns that end in "-a"

It 's like a big plaza . People walk into it and share something ( a picture , a video , whatever ) , and see if other people like it . Naturally , these crowds get more attention , since they 're at the front . People also start to talk inside the crowds , and start discussions . The most popular discussions gather a group of people around them ( but they 're all still in the same crowd ) . After a while , though , people get bored of it ( usually within a day ) , and they all leave to the next big thing . Points keep track of how many big crowds you 've had for all time . Basically , plaza(frontpage ) > crowds(posts ) > groups(comments ) . Number of people in crowds / groups is karma points . There are also smaller plazas for people who like certain things . Let 's say it 's ponies . In this plaza , you can only talk about ponies , and the most popular things about ponies get a big crowd .

The fact that Cuba is a regime hostile to the United States is a significant strategic liability to American interests . It does n't really matter much in 2014 , since there are no real rival superpowers , but during the years of the Soviet Union , the fact that Cuba was an ally of the USSR was worrisome . The most obvious instance is the Cuban Missile Crisis of course . If a future superpower can station military assets in Cuba , they can threaten the United States . If one wanted to hit New Orleans , which serves as the largest port in the Western Hemisphere , Cuba would be the staging ground . The United States would love it if a more friendly regime came

then a new government more hospitable to the United States may come in , which would be good for both parties . The second reason is political . There 's a large Cuban - American population in the United States ( Florida in particular ) , who mostly fled Cuba when the Communists took over because their assets would be confiscated . They are very much opposed to a shift in American policy on the Cuba situation . Cuba may be the only place in the world that is a strategic threat to the United States mainland .

Zero volatility stocks are stocks that do not experience significant price fluctuations over a given period of time. In intraday trading, it is generally difficult to find zero volatility stocks because the prices of most stocks tend to fluctuate significantly during the course of a trading day. However, there are some stocks that are less volatile than others and may be considered as candidates for zero volatility. Some examples of these types of stocks might include large, well-established companies with stable earnings and a track record of consistent dividends, or companies in sectors that are less affected by economic or market fluctuations. To find zero volatility stocks in intraday trading in India, you might consider using a financial tool that allows you to filter stocks based on their volatility or using technical analysis to identify stocks with relatively stable price patterns.

Much of it is bullshit . The five different parts of your tongue are based on someone not understanding a translation of a document from another language in 1901 . Flavors are made up of different tastes . We experience them with different " taste receptors . " There are n't five kinds of taste receptors , there 's [ lots . ] ( URL_0 ) However , it makes sense to group the different combinations of " tastes " ( as we experience them ) into the five different " tastes " you know . " Savory " as others have mentioned was recognized recently by the western world as a fifth " taste " because genetic sequencing and chemical analysis advanced to the point where " umami " was deemed significantly different enough from " salty " to qualify as its own " taste . " It 's not a new thing , however , just a new taxonomy . " Flavor " is an exercise in taxonomy , for that matter . We 've arbitrarily assigned concepts to our experiences of the chemistry of our sense of taste that have no significant chemical basis . Much like oenophiles ' descriptions of wine , there are a bunch of arbitrary sensations and we 've sort of collectively agreed to lump them together .

It can be difficult when co-owners of a property disagree about whether to sell. One option may be to try to come to a compromise or agreement through negotiation. This could involve discussing the reasons for wanting to sell or not wanting to sell, and exploring potential alternatives that might meet everyone's needs.If it's not possible to reach an agreement through negotiation, the co-owners may need to consider other options, such as mediation or arbitration, which involve a neutral third party who can help facilitate a resolution.Alternatively, if the co-owners are unable to resolve their differences, one option might be to seek a legal partition of the property, which would allow the co-owners to divide the property into separate ownership interests. Minecraft is a video game that allows players to build and explore virtual worlds made up of blocks. In the game, players can gather resources, craft items, and build structures using a variety of different blocks. They can also explore different biomes (areas with different terrain and features), mine for valuable resources, and fight off hostile mobs (enemies). One of the things that makes Minecraft special is its open-ended gameplay. There is no specific goal or objective that players must achieve in the game, so they are free to play and explore however they want. This allows for a lot of creativity and freedom, as players can build and create whatever they can imagine. Minecraft is also popular because it can be played on a variety of different platforms, including computers, consoles, and mobile devices. This means that players can play the game with their friends no matter where they are. Overall, Minecraft is a fun and creative game that allows players to build, explore, and have adventures in their own virtual worlds.

Headrests are n't there to rest your head against , but to protect you from whiplash or worse if you 're in an accident . When a car decelerates VERY quickly ( like in a head - on collision ) and you are wearing your seat belt , then your arms and upper torso will fly forward very quickly . The three - point seat belt keeps you from flying through the windshield or splattering over the dashboard , but after it catches you , your body snaps backward very quickly . The quickest part to snap backwards is your head . Your body from the shoulders down is caught by the seat itself , but without the " headrest " , your head would snap backwards over the seat while the rest of your body stays put . This would be really bad for obvious reasons . The headrest is angled forward so that when your head slams back against it at 60 mph , the headrest compressess , and your head stops when it is more or less over top of your shoulders .

It 's called a " hypnic jerk " ( " hypnic " as in for example " hypnotic " , meaning " sleep - related " ) and the exact cause is n't actually known . The American Academy of Sleep Medicine ( an organisation that studies sleep ) say that a lot of things might be the potential cause of these hypnic jerk ( the list includes stress , caffeine , etc . ) , but most hypnic jerks just occur randomly . An interesting hypothesis ( or " idea " ) as to why humans experience hypnic jerks , has to do with evolution . I 'll explain with an anecdote ( a short story ) . Imagine an animal that sleeps high up in trees

. Seems dangerous , right ? If the animal falls into a deep sleep , it would risk falling out of the tree and being seriously hurt , or even dying . Now imagine that some of these animals wake up , whenever their body feels as though it is falling . Those animals would n't fall to their death , because they would wake up and adjust their sleeping position . Since the animals that experience a " hypnic jerk " live longer than those who do n't , they have a better chance of passing on their " genes " to their children , who will also experience a hypnic jerk . They will likewise live longer , have more children , pass on the trait

and so on . This is actually a simple model for how evolution works ! Human ancestors would also have lived in trees ( if you go back far enough ) , and so , the same logic applies to us . The hypnic jerk we experience , might be a " leftover " from a time when we needed it to survive ! Another theory as to why humans experience hypnic jerks , is that your brain " thinks " that your body is dying when you enter sleep ( due to things like your body temperature dropping etc . ) and as a result , makes your muscles jolt to make sure your not dying . This theory however seems a bit strange to me and

happens at random , some factors can make it more likely to happen . It 's perfectly normal although the exact reason is unknown . It may be an archaic reflex that helped early humans not fall out of trees . Some say it 's the brain making sure the body is n't dying , but I ca n't find a credible source for this .

Example-based machine translation (EBMT) is a type of machine translation (MT) that relies on a database of translated sentence pairs to translate new text. The basic idea behind EBMT is that it can use these examples as a reference to guide the translation of new text, by finding similar examples in the database and adapting them to fit the new text.To use EBMT, the system first builds a database of translated sentence pairs, which can be obtained through manual translation or machine translation. The database is then used as a reference for translating new text. Just over two weeks later, on September 17, 1939, the Soviet Union invaded Poland from the east, in accordance with a secret agreement with Germany known as the Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact. The invasion of Poland marked the beginning of World War II in Europe.

Yes, animals can have phobias just like people can. A phobia is an irrational fear of something that is not really dangerous. Animals can develop phobias just like people can. For example, a dog might develop a phobia of loud noises if it had a scary experience with loud noises in the past. A cat might develop a phobia of water if it had a negative experience with water. Wild animals can also have phobias. For example, some wild animals might be afraid of certain predators, even if the predator is not actually present. They might also be afraid of loud noises or other things that they associate with danger. Overall, phobias are a natural way for animals (and people) to protect themselves from potential dangers. However, sometimes phobias can become irrational and cause problems for the animal (or person) that has them. In these cases, it might be necessary to seek help from a professional to overcome the phobia.

Cancer is a type of disease that occurs when cells in the body begin to grow out of control. These abnormal cells can form tumors and can also spread to other parts of the body.There are many different types of cancer, and each type can affect the body in different ways. Some types of cancer can be treated and cured, while others can be slowed down or managed for a period of time. However, if cancer is not treated, it can eventually lead to death.Cancer can kill people in a few different ways. One way is by spreading (metastasizing) to other parts of the body and damaging or destroying important organs and tissues. For example, if cancer spreads to the brain, it can cause brain damage and lead to death.Another way that cancer can kill people is by disrupting the body's normal functions. For example, cancer can cause the body to produce too many or too few blood cells, which can lead to anemia (too few red blood cells) or bleeding (too few platelets). It can also cause the body to have problems with digestion, breathing, and other important functions.In short, cancer can kill people by spreading to other parts of the body and disrupting the body's normal functions. It is important to catch and treat cancer as early as possible to give the best chance of a successful outcome.

A ranked voting system is a way of casting and counting votes in an election where voters are able to rank the candidates in order of preference. Instead of just choosing one candidate, voters can indicate their top choice, second choice, third choice, and so on.In a ranked voting system, if a candidate wins a majority of first-choice votes, they are declared the winner just like in a normal election. If no candidate wins a majority of first-choice votes, then the candidate with the fewest votes is eliminated and their votes are redistributed to the voters' next choice. This process is repeated until one candidate has a majority of votes and is declared the winner.One advantage of ranked voting is that it can help ensure that the winner

or independent candidates to win elections. Since voters are able to rank multiple candidates in order of preference, they can choose to support a third-party candidate as their first choice while still expressing a preference for one of the major party candidates as their second choice. This could make it more likely that a third-party candidate could win an election, or at least have a stronger influence on the outcome.

Shampoo and body wash are both used to clean your body, but they are used on different parts of your body and are formulated to clean different types of dirt and oils. Shampoo is specifically designed to clean your hair, while body wash is meant for cleaning your skin. Shampoo is usually a liquid that is applied to your hair, and it is used to remove dirt, oil, and other types of buildup that can make your hair look and feel greasy or dirty. It is usually used on the scalp and hair, and it is rinsed off with water after it is applied. Body wash is a liquid or gel that is used to clean your skin. It is usually applied with a washcloth or loofah and then rinsed off with water. Body wash is formulated to clean the dirt and oils that can accumulate on your skin, and it is usually used on the entire body. In short, shampoo is used to clean your hair, while body wash is used to clean your skin. Both products are important for keeping your body clean and healthy, but they are used in different ways and are formulated to clean different types of dirt and oils.

When an animal is swallowed whole by a predator, it can be a dangerous and potentially deadly situation for the prey. Depending on the size of the predator and the prey, the prey may struggle and try to escape, or it may be unable to move at all. If the prey is a fish or another type of aquatic animal, it may be able to survive for a short time by using its gills to breathe while inside the predator's stomach. However, eventually the lack of oxygen and the acidic environment of the stomach will likely kill the prey. If the prey is a mammal, it may also be able to survive for a short time by breathing through its nose or mouth, if it is not completely covered by the predator's stomach contents. However, eventually the lack of oxygen and the acidic environment of the stomach will likely kill the prey. It's important to remember that being swallowed whole is a very dangerous and potentially deadly situation for an animal, and it is not something that happens often in the wild. It is much more common for predators to catch and kill their prey before swallowing it.

Anti-cheat systems like PunkBuster and VAC (Valve Anti-Cheat) work by constantly monitoring a player's game activity and looking for any suspicious behavior that might indicate that the player is cheating. Another way anti-cheat systems work is by scanning a player's computer for any software or programs that could be used to cheat. If the system finds any suspicious programs, it will take action to prevent the player from using them while they are playing the game. Anti-cheat systems can be improved in a number of ways. One way is by constantly updating the algorithms and rules that are used to detect suspicious behavior. This can help to ensure that the system is able to catch new and emerging forms of cheating. Another way to improve anti-cheat systems is by working closely with game developers to ensure that the system is able to properly detect and prevent cheating in their games. Overall, anti-cheat systems are an important part of the online gaming experience, as they help to ensure that players are able to enjoy a fair and fun game without having to worry about others cheating.

Net income, also known as net profit or earnings, is a company's total earnings or profit after deducting all expenses. It is an important measure of a company's financial performance, and it is typically one of the key factors that investors consider when evaluating a company's stock.In general, there is a positive correlation between a company's net income and its stock price. When a company has strong net income, it typically means that it is generating a lot of revenue and has a healthy bottom line. As a result, investors may be more likely to buy the company's stock, which can drive the stock price up.On the other hand, when a company has weak net income or is operating at a loss, it can be a red flag for investors, and the stock price may decline as a result. However, it's important to note that there are many other factors that can influence a company's stock price, including market conditions, industry trends, and the overall performance of the economy.In summary, net income can be an important indicator of a company's financial health, and it can have a significant impact on the company's stock price. However, it is just one of many factors that investors consider when evaluating a company's stock, and it is not the only factor that determines the stock's price.

In the late 1800s, there were two main types of electrical systems being developed: direct current (DC), which was promoted by Thomas Edison, and alternating current (AC), which was promoted by Nikola Tesla.DC power is a type of electrical power that flows in one direction, from a positive terminal to a negative terminal. It is used in many electronic devices, such as batteries and cellphones.AC power is a type of electrical power that alternates its direction of flow, typically at a frequency of 50 or 60 Hz (hertz). It is used to power most homes and businesses.The debate between DC and AC power centered on which type of power was better for transmitting electricity over long distances. Edison believed that DC power was better because it was easier to distribute and use. However, Tesla argued that AC power was superior because it could be transmitted over much longer distances and at higher voltages, making it more efficient.Ultimately, AC power won out and is now the most widely used type of electrical power. However, DC power is still used in many applications, such as in batteries and electronic devices. So, both types of power are still in use today.

It 's important to understand that the boundaries you occasionally see on maps are claims , not internationally recognised territories . The borders you see on maps [ such as this ] ( URL_1 ) do not define tracts of land that are actually owned by the country . Under the [ Antarctic Treaty ] ( URL_0 ) , all of the countries with claims on Antarctica agreed on a number of things , including that Antarctica would only be used for the common good of mankind . The Antarctic Treaty is probably one of the best examples of international cooperation in the 20th Century and it 's quite extraordinary that countries actually agreed to it because the agreement was made deep in the Cold War . For all practical purposes , at the present , the claims are more or less irrelevant and many countries have built research stations in claims that belong to other countries . * However * , the Antarctic Treaty expires in 2048 . The big question is what will happen after 2048 , and I do n't think anybody really knows the answer to that .

Stephen William Hawking CH CBE FRS FRSA (8 January 1942 – 14 March 2018) was an English theoretical physicist, cosmologist, and author who, at the time of his death, was director of research at the Centre for Theoretical Cosmology at the University of Cambridge.[17][18] Between 1979 and 2009, he was the Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cambridge, widely viewed as one of the most prestigious academic posts in the world.[19]Hawking was born in Oxford into a family of physicians.  In October 1959, at the age of 17, he began his university education at University College, Oxford,  where he received a first-class BA degree in physics. In October 1962, he began his graduate work at Trinity Hall at the University of Cambridge where, in March

1966, he obtained his PhD degree in applied mathematics and theoretical physics, specialising in general relativity and cosmology. In 1963, at age 21, Hawking was diagnosed with an early-onset slow-progressing form of motor neurone disease that gradually, over decades, paralysed him.[20][21] After the loss of his speech, he communicated through a speech-generating device initially through use of a handheld switch, and eventually by using a single cheek muscle.[22]Hawking's scientific works included a collaboration with Roger Penrose on gravitational singularity theorems in the framework of general relativity, and the theoretical prediction that black holes emit radiation, often called Hawking radiation. Initially, Hawking radiation was controversial. By the late 1970s and following the publication of further research, the discovery was widely accepted as a major breakthrough in theoretical physics. Hawking

several works of popular science in which he discussed his theories and cosmology in general. His book A Brief History of Time appeared on the Sunday Times bestseller list for a record-breaking 237 weeks. Hawking was a Fellow of the Royal Society, a lifetime member of the Pontifical Academy of Sciences, and a recipient of the Presidential Medal of Freedom, the highest civilian award in the United States. In 2002, Hawking was ranked number 25 in the BBC's poll of the 100 Greatest Britons. He died in 2018 at the age of 76, after living with motor neurone disease for more than 50 years.

The color of our skin is determined by a pigment called melanin, which is produced by cells called melanocytes. Melanin helps to protect the skin from the harmful effects of the sun's ultraviolet (UV) rays. People who have more melanin in their skin tend to have darker skin, while people with less melanin tend to have lighter skin. The pubic region is not necessarily more shielded from the sun than other parts of the body, but it is possible that it may receive less direct sunlight because it is typically covered by clothing. However, the amount of melanin in our skin is not solely determined by exposure to sunlight. There are other factors that can affect melanin production, such as genetics, hormones, and certain medications. So, to answer your question, the pubic region may appear to have darker skin compared to other parts of the body because it receives less direct sunlight, but this is not the only factor that determines skin color.

Incandescent bulbs can be made to suit different voltages just by changing the size / geometry of the filament . So a torch bulb looks similar to a mains bulb , it 's just smaller . And incandescent bulbs are relatively easy to dim : just reduce the voltage reaching them . LEDs are different : the physics of them means that they need a particular voltage to work properly , and you have to put some sort of current - limiting on them , as they get greedier and greedier the hotter they get ( if you do n't limit the current they keep taking more and more current until they burn up - * thermal runaway * ) . So most LED bulbs have a special

circuit inside that drops the mains voltage down to something more suitable for the LEDs , and it usually protects the LED from taking too much current so it does n't burn up . And because LEDs need a particular voltage to work right , you ca n't just reduce the voltage to dim them ; you have to take a different approach . PWM ( Pulse width modulation ) is what 's used : it takes advantage of the fact that our eyes ca n't tell the difference between a light that 's permanently on , and one that 's pulsing on and off at high frequency ( anything faster than 100 pulses a second just looks constant to us ) . First , you need to know that our brains " get off " on subconsciously predicting patterns correctly . When your brain listens to a simple beat it has no trouble with predicting what happens next in the song . This makes your brain release " feel good " chemicals and you end up liking the tune . As a melody gets complex you brain ca n't predict it correctly , thus no dopamine release . This causes you to not enjoy the song . But , as you listen to the same complex melody again and again , your brain starts picking up the changes and is able to predict them more accurately . After a while you start liking the song ( AND ANY SIMILAR SONGS

to the song because there are so many more patterns for your brain to predict correctly . So good artists try to straddle a fine line where they want their song to be simple and catchy as well as dynamic and complex . This allows for an easy listening experience at first as well as a " greater high " as time goes on because your brain starts predicting every melody change in the song instead of just the simple ones . This is why classical music , with all its infinite twists and turns , is still being listened to today whereas pop music goes out of style quickly .

The ocean is made of salt water because it contains dissolved salt. When the ocean's water evaporates, the salt is left behind. Some lakes, like the Great Salt Lake in Utah, are saltier than others because they have more dissolved salt. The amount of salt in the ocean does not change much over time. There is a constant balance between the amount of salt that flows into the ocean from rivers and the amount of salt that is removed from the ocean through evaporation.

Circumcision is the surgical removal of the foreskin, which is a fold of skin that covers the head of the penis. It is often performed for religious or cultural reasons, and it is sometimes also done for medical reasons.There are both pros and cons to being circumcised. Some people believe that circumcision can help reduce the risk of certain health problems, such as infections and sexually transmitted diseases. Others argue that circumcision can cause pain and discomfort, and that it can also interfere with sexual pleasure.It's important to understand that circumcision is a personal decision that should be made by the person who will be affected by it, whether that is an adult man or a parent considering it for their child. It's also important to understand that there is no one "right" answer when it comes to circumcision, and that different people may have different opinions and experiences with it.If you are considering circumcision for your unborn son, it's important to carefully weigh the pros and cons and to think about what is best for your child's health and well-being. You should also talk to your doctor or a healthcare professional about the potential risks and benefits of circumcision.

Error messages in computers are usually generated by the operating system or a specific program when something goes wrong. For example, if you try to open a file that doesn't exist, the operating system might display an error message saying "File not found" or "No such file or directory." There are different types of error messages, and they can be caused by different things. Some error messages are caused by problems with the computer's hardware, like a malfunctioning network card or a failing hard drive. Others are caused by problems with the software, like a bug in the program or a conflict with another piece of software. Error messages are usually written by the developers of the operating system or program in order to help users understand what went wrong and how to fix the problem. They can be written in plain language or in technical jargon, depending on the audience and the complexity of the issue. In general, error messages are designed to help users identify and troubleshoot problems with their computers. They are an important part of the computer's overall system of error handling and can be very helpful when things go wrong.

When you receive restricted stock units (RSUs), you may be taxed on the value of the units as ordinary income when they vest. The amount of ordinary income that you will recognize is equal to the value of the units at vesting minus the amount that you paid for the units (if any). The value of the units at vesting is known as the "fair market value" (FMV) of the units.If you sell the shares of stock that you received from the RSUs after they vest, you may also have to pay capital gains tax on any profits that you make from the sale. The profit is calculated as the selling price minus your adjusted cost basis in the shares. The adjusted cost basis is the price that you paid for the shares (if any) plus the amount of ordinary income that you recognized when the RSUs vested, minus any commissions or fees that you paid when you sold the shares.It's important to note that the tax treatment of RSUs can vary depending on your specific circumstances and the laws in your jurisdiction. You should consult with a tax professional or refer to your local tax laws for more information.

Ethernet Gigabit is a high-speed networking technology that supports data transfer rates of up to 1 Gigabit per second (1 Gbps). It is based on the Ethernet standard, which is a widely used networking technology for local area networks (LANs). Gigabit Ethernet is typically used to connect devices within a LAN, such as computers, servers, and other networking equipment, and is often used in business environments to enable fast and reliable data transfer between devices. It is also used in some home networking applications, particularly for applications that require high-bandwidth connectivity, such as streaming video or online gaming. Ethernet Gigabit is commonly implemented using twisted pair or fiber optic cable, and can be used with a variety of networking protocols, including TCP/IP and IPX/SPX.

Efficient ways to kill people * are n't * outlawed . What is outlawed is excessively cruel or difficult to control weapons . Weapons designed to mutilate but not kill would be a massive drain on morale and medical resources . Chemical and Biological weapons can make land unusable and tend to hit noncombatants / your own side ; and biological weapons have the potential to spread out of control . Countries agree not to use them because of game theory ; specifically , the ( iterated ) Prisoner 's Dilemma . If both sides use cruel / messy weapons , then * both sides are worse off when the war 's over * . If either side starts using such weapons , the other side has little reason not to start using them as well . Therefore , it 's in both sides best interest to agree not to use them .

While reducing volume of the trash is novel , it 's not economically viable in most places on Earth because we 're not hurting for the space . But that 's not why we do n't do it . Sweden BUY 'S trash from surrounding countries because they 're so efficient at recycling and trash management , and incinerators are a significant part of their energy production . Incinerators have a substantial startup and operation cost . It obviously only makes sense if it 's going to net a profit . Dumping trash in places with the space to do it is pretty damn cheap , so they have to contend with that , and energy production can itself be pretty cheap , so an incinerator is competing on two financial fronts . While it 's probably the eco friendly and responsible thing to do , markets are n't driven by what is moral and ethical , no , they 're dragged kicking , clawing , and screaming , after dishing out a few punches . They 're driven by what makes investors the most money . As for the punches , a local power company successfully waged a slander campaign against an incinerator development near me , some 25 years ago , and the facility is abandoned , having never been fired .

Sure! Imagine you have a bag of candy, and you want to give some of your candy to your friends. If you give each of your friends one piece of candy, you would have given out a total of 1 * the number of friends you have candy to. Now, let's say you don't have any friends, and you still want to give out candy. How many pieces of candy would you give out? You would give out 0 pieces of candy, right? That's because you don't have any friends to give the candy to. This is similar to what happens when we use exponents. When we have a number, like 5, and we raise it to the power of 0, it means we are multiplying 5 by itself 0 times. Just like in the candy example, if we don't have any friends to give the candy to, we don't give out any candy. So, when we raise a number to the power of 0, we get 1, because we are not multiplying the number by itself at all. I hope that helps! Do you have any other questions?

Suicide is not illegal in most places, but it is generally seen as a serious problem and a public health issue because it is often a result of mental health issues or other problems that a person is struggling with. When a person is feeling overwhelmed or hopeless, they may consider suicide as a way to escape their problems. However, suicide is a permanent solution to what are often temporary problems, and it can have a devastating impact on the people who are left behind. That's why it is important to provide support and resources to people who may be considering suicide, and to help them find other ways to cope with their problems. It's also important to remember that people who are feeling suicidal often need professional help to get through this difficult time, and that is something that is available to them.

It's true that no two snowflakes are exactly alike. This is because snowflakes are formed when water vapor in the air turns into ice crystals in the sky. The process of forming a snowflake is influenced by many factors, including the temperature, humidity, and the presence of other particles in the air. As a result, each snowflake ends up being unique, with its own particular shape and pattern.Imagine if you had a bunch of different shaped blocks, and you tried to stack them on top of each other to build a tower. No matter how you tried, you would never be able to make two towers that were exactly alike, because each block is different and will fit in different ways. It's the same with snowflakes. They may have some similarities, but no two are exactly the same.

My favorite explanation uses a vector analogy . So if we think of a normal X , Y , dimension plane , and we 're in a race car . If we move in a diagonal direction , we are moving in both the X and Y dimensions . If we move directly in the X direction , then there is no motion in the Y direction . Now , relativity says that time is simply additional dimension to space . So if we are not moving at all , then we are exclusively moving through time ( think only moving on the X axis as above ) . But once we start moving through space , it takes away from our motion through time . At slow speeds of movement through space , it 's kind of like diagonally moving on the X , Y plane from above . But as we approach the speed of light , we are moving so fast through one dimension ( space ) , that we are almost not moving through the time dimension at all . Brian Greene 's book " The Elegant Universe " does a fantastic job describing this .

When you drink alcohol, it can affect the way your body regulates your sleep-wake cycle. Alcohol can make it easier for you to fall asleep initially, but it can also interfere with the quality of your sleep. This can cause you to wake up earlier than you normally would, even if you've had a lot to drink the night before.Additionally, as your body metabolizes the alcohol, it can cause an increase in urine production, which may lead to needing to use the bathroom more frequently during the night. This could also contribute to waking up earlier than you normally would.It's important to keep in mind that drinking alcohol can have negative effects on your health, including disrupting your sleep patterns. It's generally recommended to drink in moderation, if at all.

I 'll talk only about the British monarchy since that 's what I know a bit about . First , to contrast with the republic system of America . The President is the head of state who personifies the nation abroad and also the leader of the government . Some people think that is good because he is democratically elected . That 's fair enough but in Britain many of us would find it a bit strange that someone with all that power also has that reverence that surrounds the head of state . Here the Prime Minister is the most powerful person who leads the government . He is obviously respected but not as much as the Queen . She has no power to make laws ,

that was taken away over long centuries of building up democracy . She is still the head of state who is above political squabbles and personifies the nation when important guests arrive or important things happen or worthy people are rewarded . She has been Queen since 1953 so she has been a constant through a huge slice of history and change in Britain , whereas Presidents of other countries come and go and are remembered for the dated politics of the day . This idea that we call " continuity " is important to those in favour of the monarchy . In the old days of course the King or Queen had was often a tyrant , but now we see them as a guard against tyranny

. In the armed forces there is a big deal made of their loyalty being to the Queen . She or other royals always appear at a lot of military functions . The idea is that anyone wanting too much power in Britain would at some point have to confront the Queen , since she embodies our laws and democracy , and it would be that much harder to turn the army and the people away from her . This is also part of the reason all new laws are read out by the Queen in a special ceremony . Another job of the Queen is to provide a sense of identity , especially now that the British identity is quite up for debate with so many changes

The word "Filipino" comes from the language itself, which is called "Pilipino" in the native language. In the native language, the word "Pilipino" starts with the letter "P," so when it was translated into English, it became "Filipino" with an "F." So, the country is called the "Philippines" with an "s" at the end because it is named after a Spanish king and the word comes from the Spanish language. The language is called "Filipino" with an "o" at the end because that is how the word is spelled in English and it comes from the native language of the Philippines.

Recycling can provide tax benefits in several ways:Tax credits: Some governments offer tax credits for businesses that recycle a certain percentage of their waste or use recycled materials in their products.Tax deductions: Businesses may be able to claim tax deductions for expenses related to recycling, such as the cost of recycling equipment or transportation costs for recycled materials.Property tax exemptions: In some cases, governments may offer property tax exemptions for businesses that recycle a certain percentage of their waste or use recycled materials in their products.It's important to note that the specific tax benefits of recycling vary depending on the jurisdiction and the specific recycling activities being undertaken. If you are interested in pursuing tax benefits for recycling, it's a good idea to consult with a tax professional or research the specific tax laws in your area.

Augurs were Roman religious officials who were responsible for interpreting the will of the gods through the observation of natural signs and omens. They used a number of techniques to do this, including:Observing the flight patterns of birds: The augurs would watch the flight patterns of birds and interpret them as signs from the gods. For example, a group of birds flying in a certain direction or performing certain movements might be seen as a sign of good or bad luck.Examining the entrails of animals: The augurs would also examine the entrails of animals, such as sheep or chickens, after they were sacrificed to the gods. They believed that the gods could communicate through the appearance and position of the organs in the animal's body.Consulting the Sibylline Books: The augurs could also consult the Sibylline Books, which were a collection of oracular prophecies and rituals believed to have been given to the Romans by the Greek sibyls. These books contained a variety of information that the augurs could use to interpret the will of the gods.Interpreting natural phenomena: The augurs could also interpret natural phenomena, such as thunder and lightning, as signs from the gods. They believed that these events were controlled by the gods and could be used to communicate their will.

It's completely understandable that you might be curious about how to tell the difference between different East Asian cultures and want to learn more about them. However, it's important to remember that it is not appropriate or respectful to try to guess someone's cultural background based on their physical appearance. People of different East Asian cultures may have certain physical characteristics in common, such as straight black hair and slanted eyes, but these features do not define a person's identity or culture.Instead of trying to differentiate between cultures based on physical appearance, it is much more respectful to simply ask someone about their cultural background if you are curious. This allows them to share their own experiences and traditions with you and helps to foster mutual understanding and respect.It's also important to recognize that culture is much more than just physical appearance. It includes language, customs, traditions, beliefs, values, and many other factors that shape a person's identity and experiences. So it's really not possible to accurately differentiate between cultures based on just one aspect like physical appearance.

Microsoft Translator is a multilingual machine translation cloud service provided by Microsoft. Microsoft Translator is a part of Microsoft Cognitive Services and integrated across multiple consumer, developer, and enterprise products; including Bing, Microsoft Office, SharePoint, Microsoft Edge, Microsoft Lync, Yammer, Skype Translator, Visual Studio, and Microsoft Translator apps for Windows, Windows Phone, iPhone and Apple Watch, and Android phone and Android Wear.Microsoft Translator also offers text and speech translation through cloud services for businesses. Service for text translation via the Translator Text API ranges from a free tier supporting two million characters per month to paid tiers supporting billions of characters per month. Speech translation via Microsoft Speech services is offered based on time of the audio stream.The service supports text translation between 110 languages and language varieties as of December 2022. It also supports several speech translation systems that currently power the Microsoft Translator live conversation feature, Skype Translator, and Skype for Windows Desktop, and the Microsoft Translator Apps for iOS and Android.

When you choose to buy vegetarian products or support organizations that advocate for animal welfare, you are helping to promote these values and encourage more companies to adopt similar practices. It's important to note that becoming vegetarian is just one way that individuals can make a difference for animals. There are many other ways to get involved in animal welfare, such as volunteering at animal shelters, supporting animal rights organizations, and advocating for animal-friendly policies. Every little bit helps, and together we can all make a positive impact for animals.

We know that all P ( very specific answer - type ) problems are also NP ( easy for computers to check the answers to with specific parameters ) , but we do n't know whether all NP problems ( difficult for computers to come up with their own solutions due to ambiguous rules ) are also P problems ( easy for computers to check AND solve due to their specificity ) . Put another way , do problems exist that a true - logic system can not reliably solve quickly and correctly ? We do n't know !

A war is a military conflict , not a civilian one . Therefore , the rules / conventions are in place to prevent needless deaths of civilians and cruel treatment of the opposition 's forces . If you 're invading , the point is to convince ( whether by force or not ) the other side to allow it . If you 're being invaded , the point is to drive back the aggressors . In either case , you want to do this with minimal loss of life and financial cost . You can weaken an opposing military or government without killing everything . The object of war is * * NOT * * to kill every single person on the opposition 's forces or in their country , so the rules are in place to help prevent this .

JangusKahn pretty much established the reason why . The world can not be properly defined on a flat surface , because of this , inconsistencies arise . For instance : You can either have a map that is conical ; where all the angles are correct . This map however will not have equal area , some locations on the map will have exaggerated landscape sizes , i.e. greenland may be the size of Africa , which would be really quite incorrect . Or you can have an equal area map , with which the landscape sizes are relatively correct , but the angles are false . The Mercator projection is more or less the standard projection representing a cylindrical projection ( Called so because it 's as if you placed a cylinder around the globe and made a map ) . The scale factor increases as you get closer to the north and south poles ( This means the error in projection grows ) Also ; if you draw a straight line from one point to another over the ocean , it will not be the shortest distance between 2 points , in fact a " great circle " curve will be the shortest distance , but it will appear longer than the straight line on the Mercator projection . Therefore , Mercator projections are terrible for navigation .

Wine can give you a bad hangover because it contains alcohol, which can be toxic to your body in large amounts. When you drink alcohol, your body breaks it down into a chemical called acetaldehyde, which can be harmful to your body in large amounts. The liver is responsible for breaking down acetaldehyde, but it can only do this at a certain rate. If you drink too much alcohol too quickly, your liver can't keep up and the acetaldehyde builds up in your body, causing symptoms like a headache, nausea, and feeling tired or sluggish.Additionally, alcohol can also cause your body to become dehydrated, which can contribute to feelings of nausea and a headache. Alcohol can also disrupt your sleep, which can make you feel tired and sluggish the next day.It's important to drink alcohol in moderation and to stay hydrated by drinking water while you're drinking alcohol to help prevent a hangover.

Pi is a mathematical constant that represents the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter. It is represented by the symbol "π" and is approximately equal to 3.14159.One of the interesting properties of Pi is that it is an irrational number, which means that it cannot be expressed as a simple fraction (like 3/4 or 22/7). Instead, it is an infinite decimal that does not repeat in any known pattern.For example, the decimal representation of Pi goes on forever, like this: 3.14159265358979323846264338327950288419716939937510...As you can see, the decimal representation of Pi goes on indefinitely and does not repeat. This means that it is infinitely long, but it is not a repeating decimal.I hope this helps to clarify things! Let me know if you have any other questions.

matter packed into the same space. Water is a very strange substance when it comes to density. When it is a liquid, it is denser than ice. But when water turns into a solid (like when it freezes into ice), it actually expands and becomes less dense. This is because the molecules in a solid are usually arranged in a more orderly way than they are in a liquid, which means that they take up more space. So when water freezes into ice, it becomes less dense and will float on top of the liquid water. That's why ice floats in water, even though most solids are denser than the liquids they are placed in.

The market capitalization (market cap) of a company is the total value of all outstanding shares of the company's stock. It is calculated by multiplying the current market price of a company's stock by the number of shares outstanding.However, the market cap of a company does not necessarily have to be equal to the current share price multiplied by the number of shares outstanding. There can be many factors that influence a company's market cap, including its financial performance, the overall state of the market, investor sentiment, and other external factors.It's also worth noting that the market cap of a company can fluctuate over time as the stock price changes. If the stock price of a company increases, the market cap will also increase, and vice versa. Similarly, if the number of outstanding shares changes, the market cap will also be affected.Without more context, it's difficult to determine why Google's current market cap is almost twice the current share price multiplied by the number of shares outstanding. It's possible that there are other factors at play that are influencing the market cap, such as the company's financial performance, investor sentiment, or other external factors.

The basic function of the engine is to turn the wheels of the car . So let 's imagine trying to turn the wheels ourselves . The easiest way to do that would be to use a [ crank ] ( URL_0 ) . You attach a crank to the axle , so that when you turn the crank , you turn the wheels . But this is tiresome , and it would be easier to have a machine do the cranking for you . Now think on how you push when you 're turning a crank . In simplified terms , you could say you 're pushing it down on one side , and up the other . This is the idea of a [ piston ]

will not only push the first piston down , but also the second piston up . When the second piston is up , you make an explosion there . Boom ! The second piston goes down , and the first goes up again . And that way , you can make the axle turn round and round , which makes the wheels turn . So why is fuel necessary ? Because you need something to push the pistons , and an explosion is a very efficient ( and fun ) way of doing so .
